mapper.select: SELECT staff_number,staff_name,department_name,duty_name FROM hr_staff_info a,sys_duty b,sys_department c WHERE a.duty_id = b.duty_id AND b.department_id = c.department_id limit #{start},#{rows}

SELECT d.contract_id,contract_name,staff_name,department_name,contract_status,contract_official,staff_number FROM hr_contract_info a,hr_staff_info b,sys_department c,hr_employ_info d WHERE d.staff_id = b.staff_id AND c.department_id = d.department_id AND a.contract_id = d.contract_id

SELECT staff_number,staff_name,sex,department_name,duty_name, a.contract_id,contract_name,contract_type,contract_deadline_is,contract_official,contract_sign_date, contract_status,contract_deadline,contract_official_start,contract_official_end,contract_official_salary FROM hr_contract_info a,hr_staff_info b,sys_duty c,sys_department d,hr_employ_info e WHERE b.staff_id = e.staff_id AND a.contract_id = e.contract_id AND c.duty_id =e.duty_id AND d.department_id=e.department_id AND b.staff_number = #{staff_number}

SELECT staff_number,staff_name,department_name,demission_type,demission_date FROM hr_demission_info a,hr_staff_info b,sys_department c,hr_employ_info d WHERE a.staff_id = b.staff_id AND b.staff_id = d.staff_id AND c.department_id = d.department_id

SELECT staff_number,staff_name,department_name,demission_type,demission_date,sex,duty_name,staff_id_number,demission_where,demission_salary_end FROM hr_demission_info a,hr_staff_info b,sys_department c,hr_employ_info d,sys_duty e WHERE a.staff_id = b.staff_id AND b.staff_id = d.staff_id AND c.department_id = d.department_id AND e.duty_id = d.duty_id AND b.staff_number = #{staff_number}
